metadata.synopsis: Lady Flux is a member of the Ladies Court, Nine-Fingers' elite personal bodyguard. They're each as deadly as disease, and named for such.They don't waste much time talking - in these lines, they're simply stating the way they'd kill us if they had to and, later, the name they'd give us if we joined them. In one final edge-case they repeat the same mantra as a threat if Nine-Fingers is dead and we're taking over.We only learn any of this when Lady Ague herself explains the strangeness.

0.speaker: Lady Flux
0.text: We serve her still, and so do you.
0.context: NodeContext: Repeated like a loyal soldier's mantra. A warning that even though Nine-FIngers is dead, her bodyguards will ensure her will is carried out

1.speaker: Lady Flux
1.text: We serve her still, and so do you.
1.context: NodeContext: Repeated like a loyal soldier's mantra. A warning that even though Nine-FIngers is dead, her bodyguards will ensure her will is carried out

2.speaker: Lady Flux
2.context: NodeContext: Considering. All members of this elite bodyguard state only the name they'd give us if we were to join their ranks

3.speaker: Lady Flux
3.context: NodeContext: Matter of fact - all the members of this elite bodyguard only answer us by stating the way they'd kill us (their leader explains)

4.speaker: Lady Flux
4.context: NodeContext: Matter of fact - all the members of this elite bodyguard only answer us by stating the way they'd kill us (their leader explains)
